headline: Altria: A Must-Have If You Want Passive Income Right Away

headline: Rose's Income Garden Portfolio Revealed: Yield 6.2%/Defensive Sector Winners
summary: The "RIG" portfolio aims for 50% income from defensive sectors and includes 83 stocks across 11+ sectors, focusing on investment-grade stocks. Explore more details here.
